description: Golden garlic (Allium moly) is an amazing plant species that is highly praised by gardeners. Its oversized, long-lasting bulbs have a mild yet piquant flavor and generate an abundance of showy yellow flowers. With this plant species, there's no need to worry about planting multiple bulbs, as it self-propagates easily. Golden garlic's high levels of potassium, sulfur and selenium make it an effective natural remedy for many conditions, from diabetes to high cholesterol levels. And if that was not enough, the leaves and flowers of this fragrant plant make for a beautiful addition to any garden.
